description: Enumerates pairs consisting of a strongly connected labeled tournament and an arbitrary labeled tournament.
links: V. A. Liskovets, Some easily derivable sequences, J. Integer Sequences, 3 (2000), #00.2.2.
maple: A054947 := proc(n)    option remember;    if n = 1 then        1;    else        2^(n*(n-1))-add(binomial(n,t)*2^((n-1)*(n-t))*procname(t),t=1..n-1) ;    end if;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, May 10 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 24 2000
